title: Would You Rather?

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each night, present a player with a would you rather question of your choice (example: Would you rather have your role hidden upon death or have your will hidden upon death). The answer they choose will happen to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may only deal an unstoppable/overkill attack with your ability once per game. If you were to be targeted by a role that gives players an extra charge of their ability, it allows you to deal an extra overkill/unstoppable attack
- You may only use your ability to convert twice per game. These charges can’t be regained
- You cannot ban or modkill with your ability
- You can’t give players permanent invincible defense or higher. Temporary is ok

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Survive to give out at least 5 would you rather questions, and kill at least 2 people
